resources.string:
Captivate automatically detects when you connect to a captive wifi portal (e.g. Starbucks), and pops up a notification to take you to the login page for the service. Starbucks, for example, just asks you to check a box to accept their terms of service.

Captivate is developed by Zach Klippenstein, of http://zachklipp.ca.

It is also open source! Check out the dirty details on the GitHub page: https://github.com/zach-klippenstein/captivate
